name: Anonymous Impostors
descriptionEN: Impostors are anonymous to each other. Therefore impostors can accidentally kill each other. (two commands : /anonymous on|off and /soloimpostors on|off)

name: Better Polus
descriptionEN: An Among Us mod that tweaks Polus, allowing a more balanced experience

name: Chameleon
descriptionEN: The chameleon has the possibility to become invisible for a certain period of time

name: Cultist
descriptionEN: The cultist mod

name: Custom Key Binds
descriptionEN: Allows to customise your keybinds in settings

name: Custom Roles
descriptionEN: Combines 3 custom roles : The Torch, The Mayor and The Sweeper

name: Extra Roles
descriptionEN: Combines 4 extra roles : The officier, The Joker, The Engineer and The Medic

name: Lovers
descriptionEN: The primary objective of the Love Couple is to stay alive together. If they are among the last 3 players they win. Each lover can win as an Impostor or Crewmate as well.

name: Mayor
descriptionEN: The mayor vote counts as 2 players

name: Sheriff
descriptionEN: The Sheriff is able to kill Impostors. If they shoot a Crewmate, they will lose their life instead.

name: Smol
descriptionEN: An Among Us Mod that makes the map and pets bigger

name: Sweeper
descriptionEN: The Sweeper is a crewmate that can vent

name: Torch
descriptionEN: The Torch has full vision, even when the lights are out

name: Tryhard
descriptionEN: Among us mod that fixes some game breaking bugs when tryharding among us. As well as some useful settings

name: [Launchpad] All Of Us
descriptionEN: Allows to play on launchpad custom server with 4 mods (Battle royal, Captain, Guard & Medic) and adds a few options (Crew venting, body dragging)

name: [Cheap-YT] Anonymous
descriptionEN: Allows to play on Cheat-YT custom server with Anonymous role

name: [Cheap-YT] Battle Royal
descriptionEN: Allows to play on Cheat-YT custom server with Battle Royal mod

name: [Cheap-YT] Cleaner
descriptionEN: Allows to play on Cheat-YT custom server with Cleaner role

name: [Cheap-YT] Color Swap
descriptionEN: Allows to play on Cheat-YT custom server with Color Swap mod

name: [Cheap-YT] Confusion
descriptionEN: Allows to play on Cheat-YT custom server with Confusion mod

name: [Cheap-YT] Infinite Kill Distance
descriptionEN: Allows to play on Cheat-YT custom server with Infinite Kill Distance mod

name: [Cheap-YT] Invisibility
descriptionEN: Allows to play on Cheat-YT custom server with Invisibility mod

name: [Cheap-YT] Jester
descriptionEN: Allows to play on Cheat-YT custom server with Jester role

name: [Cheap-YT] Quantum Tunneling
descriptionEN: Allows to play on Cheat-YT custom server with Quantum Tunneling mod

name: Skeld.net
descriptionEN: Allows to play on Skeld.net custom server with many mods
